subject: RE: [junit] Custom report
msgSnippet: Thanx Erik I am looking for a solution without using Ant. Regards Manjula ... From: Erik Husby [mailto:ehusby@phaseforward.com] Sent: Monday, December 17, 2001
messageBody:
Thanx Erik
I am looking for a solution without using Ant.
Regards
Manjula

-----Original Message-----
From: Erik Husby [mailto:ehusby@...]
Sent: Monday, December 17, 2001 8:51 PM
To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [junit] Custom report


Check out Ant (http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/index.html) It includes a JUnit
and JUnitReport task that capture the results in XML and then apply
formatting to them to produce some very nice HTML pages.
